history.proof: qsimpl time: 2 use: SeparationAlgebra,DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra. qsimpl time: 2 use: SeparationAlgebra,DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra.

exceptions.tactic: intros worlds R J SA uSA.
intros worlds' R J SA uSA.
intros worlds' R' J SA uSA.
intros worlds' R' J' SA uSA.
intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce SeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.tactic: intros n n' m H H0.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.tactic: intros n n' m H' H0.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.tactic: intros n n' m H' H0'.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.tactic: destruct H as [n'' [H1 H2]], H0 as [n [H3 H4]].

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: The reference n'' was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: In environment X1, X0, X : forall worlds : Type, Relation worlds -> Join worlds -> Prop worlds : Type R : Relation worlds J : Join worlds uSA : forall m n m1 m2 : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> m <= n -> exists n1 n2 : worlds, join n1 n2 n /\\ m1 <= n1 /\\ m2 <= n2 worlds', R', J', SA', uSA' : worlds H0 : SA' <= worlds' H1 : uSA' <= R' x, x0 : worlds H2 : worlds' <= x H : R' <= x0 H4 : join x x0 J' join_comm : forall m1 m2 m : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> join m2 m1 m join_assoc : forall mx my mz mxy mxyz : worlds, join mx my mxy -> join mxy mz mxyz -> exists myz : worlds, join my mz myz /\\ join mx myz mxyz PreOrder_Reflexive : Reflexive Krelation PreOrder_Transitive : Transitive Krelation Unable to unify "uSA' <= R'" with "exists n2 : worlds, SA' <= worlds' /\\ uSA' <= n2 /\\ join worlds' n2 worlds'".

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros worlds' R' J' SA' uSA'.
exceptions.exn: The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra. intros worlds R J SA uSA. unfold SeparationAlgebra, DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra in SA. unfold UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra, DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra in uSA. intros n n' m H H0. unfold residue in H, H0. destruct H as [n'' [H1 H2]], H0 as [n [H3 H4]]. exists n. split. - exists n''. split. + apply H1. + transitivity n'. * apply H4. * apply H2. - apply H3.
